title: Pro Choice
itunes:title: Pro Choice
description:
Today on the show after the disappointment of the overturn of Roe Vs. Wade, we had our listeners call in to give their reaction on the recent report. Moreover, Charlamagne ended up giving a well deserved "Donkey of the Day" to the supreme court for them overturning Roe vs. Wade. However, even with the disappointing news, there was some entertainment over the weekend when it came to the versuz battle with Omarion vs Ray J and the BET awards. In fact, we opened the phone lines to get our listeners take on the BET awards. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
